roleset.name: reclone part of a previously-cloned DNA segment into a new vector

example.name: intentional agent
example.text: We subcloned two chicken H3 histone genes and transfected them into Rat 3 cell line.

example.name: parent and destination vectors
example.text: The gene encoding ɸ8 P4 helicase was subcloned from pET32 into pET28b for incorporation of an N-terminal His tag (pET28b-P4-His).
example.arg: The gene encoding ɸ8 P4 helicase
